articles.title: iPhone 1 — A ‘revolutionary’ smartphone that debuted at the 2007 Oscars - ThePrint
articles.description: Apple's commercial for its first smartphone featured clips from over 30 different movies and TV shows, including ‘The Fugitive’, ‘The Incredibles’ and ‘American Graffiti’.
